author: John R. Balmes
title: Opinion | Mask shortages are outrageous. The federal government needs to do better. - The Washington Post
description: Lack of N95 masks, other equipment in emergency rooms and hospitals put our medical workers in unnecessary danger.
content: And what do we find in cities like New York, New Orleans and Detroit where the pandemic is raging? We see severe shortages of the N95 masks in emergency rooms and hospitals. Even surgical masks, which provide some protection, are in short supply at many healt… [+4063 chars]
